verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy design, this place in time,
That I might seek and find my God, my God.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord, I wanna yearn for You.
I wanna burn with passion over You and only You. (2X)
Lord, I wanna yearn.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your joy is mine. Yet why am I fine
With all my singing and bringing grain in light of Him?

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Lord, I wanna yearn for You.
I wanna burn with passion over You and only You. (2X)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Oh You give life and breath.
In You we live and move.
That's why I sing:
